definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Be full of the heavy campus moment into the cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 佈滿暮氣的校園瞬間淪爲死亡的墓地。

sentences.english: Young people should be full of youthful spirit, and can not get lethargic due to temporary frustration.
sentences.chinese: 蓬勃，不能因爲遇到一時的挫折就顯得暮氣沉沉的。

sentences.english: Dilutes the nights cool sunset fade, it has entered a sweet dream.
sentences.chinese: 清涼的夜沖淡了夕陽的暮氣，人們進入了甜蜜的夢想。

lit. a white cloud transforms into what looks like a gray dog (idiom)/fig. the unpredictable changeability of the world
